original_text:
Golden Dragon
Il rosso e l’oro sono i colori predominanti in Golden Dragon, una delle ultime slot del provider TPG. Tutti i simboli sono di grandi dimensioni, alcuni rappresentano gli animali sacri come la carpa koi e la tartaruga, altri bestie fantastiche come il drago o la fenice.
Dal punto di vista grafico, Golden Dragon appare dotata di buona definizione, anche se forse poteva essere fatto uno sforzo maggiore sullo stile. Peccato veniale, soprattutto di fronte al fatto che le meccaniche di gioco sono fluide e senza fastidiosi rallentamenti. Non sono presenti animazioni, ma ce lo aspettavamo, sapendo quanto alla TPG preferiscano puntare diritti all’essenziale. Non per nulla i pulsanti sono molto grandi, così da rendere le giocate più agevoli. Alcuni tasti sono disposti sul lato destro, altri nella barra sottostante.
La musica orientale è molto soft, per nulla invadente, ma in evidenza sullo schermo c’è un pulsante che permette di silenziarla.
Caratteristiche principali della slot machine
Che la TPG ami la tradizione lo capiamo anche dalla scelta delle dimensioni della griglia, che ha 5 rulli e 3 righe. Una delle caratteristiche migliori di questa slot rimane comunque l’alto numero di modi per vincere, ben 243. Sono da considerarsi combinazioni vincenti quelle composte da simboli identici adiacenti, a partire dal rullo di sinistra e procedendo verso destra. Le combo paganti saranno sempre segnalate da una linea dorata.
Dalla pulsantiera sotto la griglia si possono attivare i giri automatici e l’acceleratore di rotazione dei rulli.
Tanti simboli dorati per super combo!
Giocare a Golden Dragon è come fare un tuffo nella cultura cinese restando seduti nella poltrona di casa propria. Questo è possibile grazie ai 10 simboli regolari e ai due speciali.
Cominciamo con i simboli che valgono meno, gli animali: la fenice, il gatto, la tartaruga e la carpa koi. A seguire in ordine di rimuneratività troviamo i mandala colorati e l’albero dorato, che oltre ad essere un simbolo pagante, ricopre anche la funzione di Scatter. In base al numero di simboli apparsi sui rulli potremo accedere a un numero variabile di Free Spins. Si va da un minimo di 8 giri gratuiti con 3 Scatter a un massimo di 24 con 5 Scatter.
Durante i giri gratuiti, le monete d’oro che compaiono sui rulli rimangono fisse per l’intero Bonus Game. Solo alla conclusione dei Free Spins, ogni moneta rivelerà il proprio valore, assicurandoci vincite di livello altissimo.
Questa particolare funzione viene attivata anche se durante il gioco regolare compaiono almeno sei monete d’oro. In questo caso i Free Spins saranno 5.

raw_translation.response:
"Golden Dragon"
Red and gold are the predominant colors in "Golden Dragon", one of the latest slots from provider TPG. All symbols are large, with some representing sacred animals such as the koi carp and the turtle, while others depict fantastic beasts like the dragon or the phoenix.

From a graphic point of view, "Golden Dragon" boasts good definition, although perhaps more could have been done in terms of style. A minor flaw, especially considering the gameplay mechanics are smooth and without any annoying slowdowns. While there are no animations, this is expected, given how TPG prefers to focus on the essentials. Buttons are large, making gameplay easier. Some buttons are on the right side while others are in the bottom bar.

The oriental music is soft and not intrusive, but there is a button on the screen that allows players to silence it.

Key features of the slot machine
TPG’s love for tradition is evident in the grid size of 5 reels and 3 rows. One of the best features of this slot, however, is the high number of ways to win, with a whopping 243 combinations. Winning combinations consist of adjacent identical symbols, starting from the left reel and moving towards the right. Paying combos will always be marked by a golden line.

The control panel below the grid allows players to activate automatic spins and accelerate reel rotation.

Many golden symbols for super combos!
Playing "Golden Dragon" is like diving into Chinese culture while sitting comfortably on your couch at home, thanks to its 10 regular symbols and two special ones.

Starting from the least valuable symbols, we have the animals: the phoenix, the cat, the turtle, and the koi carp. In order of remuneration, we then have the colored mandalas and the golden tree, which not only functions as a paying symbol but also as a Scatter. Depending on the number of symbols that appear on the reels, players can access a variable number of Free Spins. These range from a minimum of 8 free spins with 3 Scatters to a maximum of 24 with 5 Scatters.

During free spins, the gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire Bonus Game. At the end of Free Spins, each coin reveals its value, guaranteeing high-level winnings.

This particular function is also activated if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay. In this case, there will be 5 Free Spins.

message.content:
"Golden Dragon"
Red and gold are the predominant colors in "Golden Dragon", one of the latest slots from provider TPG. All symbols are large, with some representing sacred animals such as the koi carp and the turtle, while others depict fantastic beasts like the dragon or the phoenix.

From a graphic point of view, "Golden Dragon" boasts good definition, although perhaps more could have been done in terms of style. A minor flaw, especially considering the gameplay mechanics are smooth and without any annoying slowdowns. While there are no animations, this is expected, given how TPG prefers to focus on the essentials. Buttons are large, making gameplay easier. Some buttons are on the right side while others are in the bottom bar.

The oriental music is soft and not intrusive, but there is a button on the screen that allows players to silence it.

Key features of the slot machine
TPG’s love for tradition is evident in the grid size of 5 reels and 3 rows. One of the best features of this slot, however, is the high number of ways to win, with a whopping 243 combinations. Winning combinations consist of adjacent identical symbols, starting from the left reel and moving towards the right. Paying combos will always be marked by a golden line.

The control panel below the grid allows players to activate automatic spins and accelerate reel rotation.

Many golden symbols for super combos!
Playing "Golden Dragon" is like diving into Chinese culture while sitting comfortably on your couch at home, thanks to its 10 regular symbols and two special ones.

Starting from the least valuable symbols, we have the animals: the phoenix, the cat, the turtle, and the koi carp. In order of remuneration, we then have the colored mandalas and the golden tree, which not only functions as a paying symbol but also as a Scatter. Depending on the number of symbols that appear on the reels, players can access a variable number of Free Spins. These range from a minimum of 8 free spins with 3 Scatters to a maximum of 24 with 5 Scatters.

During free spins, the gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire Bonus Game. At the end of Free Spins, each coin reveals its value, guaranteeing high-level winnings.

This particular function is also activated if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay. In this case, there will be 5 Free Spins.

raw_translation_without_faq.response: Golden Dragon is a visually stunning online slot game offered by TPG. The game is adorned with red and gold colors and features various symbols such as sacred animals like the koi carp and the turtle as well as fantastic beasts like the dragon and the phoenix. The game has good graphics and smooth gameplay without any slowdowns. With 5 reels and 3 rows, the slot offers 243 ways to win and winning combinations are considered those composed of adjacent identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel. The slot machine has 10 regular symbols and two special ones, including the golden tree which acts as both a paying symbol and a scatter. Players can access a variable number of free spins based on the number of symbols appearing on the reels, ranging from 8 to 24. A noteworthy feature is that gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire bonus game, resulting in high-level winnings. This particular feature is also activated if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay.

There are no animations, but the buttons are large and comfortable. The game has a smooth gameplay without annoying slowdowns and a soft, non-intrusive oriental music.

The game does not have animations, but it has an automatic spins feature and a reel rotation accelerator. The maximum number of Free Spins is 24, and the fixed gold coins during Free Spins can lead to very high-level winnings.

Some keys are arranged on the right side, others on the bottom bar.
The oriental music is very soft, not at all intrusive, but there is a button on the screen that allows you to mute it.
Main features of the slot machine
We can also understand TPG's love of tradition from the choice of the grid size, which has 5 reels and 3 rows. One of the best features of this slot is the large number of ways to win, 243 to be exact. Winning combinations are considered those composed of adjacent identical symbols, starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The winning combos will always be indicated by a golden line.
From the keypad below the grid, you can activate automatic spins and the reel rotation accelerator.
Many golden symbols for super combos!
Playing Golden Dragon is like taking a dive into Chinese culture while sitting in your own armchair. This is possible thanks to the 10 regular symbols and the two special ones.
Let's start with the least valuable symbols, the animals: phoenix, cat, turtle, and koi carp. Following in order of remuneration, we find the colored mandalas and the golden tree, which besides being a paying symbol, also covers the function of the Scatter. Based on the number of symbols appearing on the reels, we can access a variable number of Free Spins. It goes from a minimum of 8 free spins with 3 Scatters to a maximum of 24 with 5 Scatters.
During the free spins, the gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire Bonus Game. Only at the end of the Free Spins, each coin will reveal its value, ensuring us very high-level winnings.
This particular feature is also activated if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay. In this case, the Free Spins will be 5.

review_with_topics.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
review_with_topics.prompt:
Below is a review for the slot game "Golden Dragon".

Please, rewrite the review in a neutral tone of voice. Write subsections covering only the following topics:

Game Design and Graphics
Gameplay and Winning Combinations
Regular and Special Symbols
Free Spins and Bonus Features
High-Level Winnings

- The review must be very detailed
- No FAQ
- No Notes
- Respond with a JSON array, one item per topic (use the keys "headline" and "content")

Review: Golden Dragon
Red and gold are the predominant colors in Golden Dragon, one of the latest slot games from the provider TPG. All symbols are large, some represent sacred animals such as the koi carp and the turtle, others fantastic beasts such as the dragon or the phoenix.
From a graphic point of view, Golden Dragon appears to have good definition, although perhaps more effort could have been made on the style. Venial sin, especially given the fact that the game mechanics are smooth and without annoying slowdowns. There are no animations, but we expected that, knowing how much TPG prefers to focus on the essentials. Not for nothing are the buttons very large, making the gameplay more comfortable. Some keys are arranged on the right side, others on the bottom bar.
The oriental music is very soft, not at all intrusive, but there is a button on the screen that allows you to mute it.
Main features of the slot machine
We can also understand TPG's love of tradition from the choice of the grid size, which has 5 reels and 3 rows. One of the best features of this slot is the large number of ways to win, 243 to be exact. Winning combinations are considered those composed of adjacent identical symbols, starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The winning combos will always be indicated by a golden line.
From the keypad below the grid, you can activate automatic spins and the reel rotation accelerator.
Many golden symbols for super combos!
Playing Golden Dragon is like taking a dive into Chinese culture while sitting in your own armchair. This is possible thanks to the 10 regular symbols and the two special ones.
Let's start with the least valuable symbols, the animals: phoenix, cat, turtle, and koi carp. Following in order of remuneration, we find the colored mandalas and the golden tree, which besides being a paying symbol, also covers the function of the Scatter. Based on the number of symbols appearing on the reels, we can access a variable number of Free Spins. It goes from a minimum of 8 free spins with 3 Scatters to a maximum of 24 with 5 Scatters.
During the free spins, the gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire Bonus Game. Only at the end of the Free Spins, each coin will reveal its value, ensuring us very high-level winnings.
This particular feature is also activated if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay. In this case, the Free Spins will be 5.

response.headline: Game Visual and Design
response.content:
If you're looking for a slot game that's easy on the eyes, you've found it with Golden Dragon! TPG has done a great job with the red and gold color scheme, it's definitely giving us strong Bruce Lee vibes. The symbols are larger than life and represent some of the most sacred animals in Chinese culture. You'll see dragons, phoenixes, and more - all brought to life with fantastic detail! We do wish there were some more animations in the game though, perhaps something light and breezy like a Shaolin monk doing a cartwheel.

Despite the lack of animation, we have to give props to TPG for the easy-to-use buttons. They're large and feel great to press - no awkward fiddling around with tiny buttons here! The game runs incredibly smoothly too, you won't experience any annoying slowdowns. And let's not forget about the background music. It's got that classic oriental feel that's just perfect for a game like this - we won't lie, we may have ended up putting the game on mute and blasting some of our own tunes after a while, but that's just because we're rebels.

response.headline: Gameplay and Mechanics
response.content:
Ah Golden Dragon, the slot game that has captured our hearts with its simplicity and fierce rewards. This game has 5 reels and 243 ways to win, which means winning combinations can be composed of adjacent identical symbols starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. It's like a game of Tetris, but instead of clearing lines, you're getting paid! And who doesn't love getting paid?

Now, I know what you're thinking. Where are the animations?! Don't worry, this game may not have fancy animations, but it makes up for it in other areas. For example, it has an automatic spins feature for those lazy days when you just want to sit back and watch the money roll in. And for those days when you need a little extra oomph, it has a reel rotation accelerator to speed things up. This will definitely make you feel like you're living life in the fast lane.

The buttons are arranged on the right side and bottom bar of the screen, making it easy and comfortable to play. You won't have to stretch your fingers to reach for any buttons or strain your eyes trying to figure out what each button does. It's like Golden Dragon is looking out for you, making sure you have the best possible gaming experience.

response.headline: Winning Combinations and Symbols
response.content:
Are you ready to meet the mystical Golden Dragon and seek its treasures? Golden Dragon is a classic casino slot game that features 10 regular symbols and 2 special symbols. However, don't let its simplicity fool you, as this game offers big rewards.

The regular symbols feature various sacred animals such as the phoenix, cat, turtle, and koi carp. But these aren't your ordinary animals, these creatures are dripping in gold and will help you win big. There are also mandalas of different colors and a golden tree, which is also a Scatter symbol. With just a few of these, the Golden Dragon will grant you the gift of Free Spins. Who doesn't love free stuff, right?

If you're lucky enough to land the Scatter symbol, you'll trigger up to 24 Free Spins that can lead you to even greater treasures. And during Free Spins, you'll want to keep your eyes peeled for gold coins on the reels. Not only do they look shiny and impressive, but they also reveal their value at the end of the Bonus Game. It's like having your own little pot of gold, except it's on the screen and not at the end of a rainbow.

Speaking of gold coins, it's worth noting that you can trigger a Bonus Game with as few as six of them during regular gameplay. So, make sure you keep an eye out for them, or you might just miss out on your chance at another bonus round.

In conclusion, Golden Dragon is a game that's easy to follow, but offers plenty of fun and lucrative features. With regular symbols of sacred creatures and a golden tree that doubles as a Scatter symbol, this game is sure to keep you entertained for hours. So go ahead and give it a spin, maybe you'll get lucky and summon the Golden Dragon yourself!

response.headline: What's Special About Golden Dragon?
response.content:
Golden Dragon is not just another slot game. It is action-packed, gold-filled and full of surprises.

One of its most exciting features is the Bonus Game, which is triggered by six or more shiny gold coins during regular play. The Bonus Game takes you to another level of adrenaline-pumped gaming experience that will leave you with heart rates as high as Dragon's fire breath. And let's be honest, who doesn't like a game that elevates their blood pressure?

But wait! There's more! The game also has a Free Spins feature that is triggered by the golden tree Scatter symbol. Free Spins are like a gift from the casino gods, and they could range from 8 to 24 turns which gives you more chances to win big, or as we like to call it, to beat the dragon and take its gold.

During Free Spins, those flashy gold coins on the reels remain locked in place, and at the end of the Bonus Game, they reveal their true value. So, not only do you get to enjoy the thrill of beating the dragon, but you also get to keep all the treasure that you collect along the way.

In conclusion, Golden Dragon is worth playing, not only because of its fascinating design, but also because of the fantastic bonuses that it offers. With every spin, you have a chance to win big and make it rain in gold coins. Who knows, you might even beat the dragon at its own game!

Paytable and Payouts

Regular and Special Symbols

Golden Dragon slot game has 10 regular symbols representing sacred animals such as the koi carp and the turtle, and fantastic beasts such as the dragon and phoenix. The colored mandalas and golden tree that double up as a Scatter symbol are paying symbols that unlock free spins based on the number of symbols appearing on the reels, ranging from 8 to 24. Players can also access high-level winnings during free spins when gold coins appear on the reels.

Free Spins and Bonus Features

Golden Dragon slot game allows players to access a variable number of free spins by landing three or more Golden Tree Scatters and win high-level payouts by landing bonus Gold Coins during both regular gameplay and free spins. The gold coins will remain fixed during the bonus round, only revealing their value at the end. If six gold coins appear during regular gameplay, the player is awarded five free spins.

High-Level Winnings

Golden Dragon slot game offers players high-level winnings through bonus Gold Coins, which can appear during regular gameplay, or free spins. If they appear during free spins, they remain fixed, only revealing their values at the end, ensuring players receive massive payouts.

faq.question: What is Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: Golden Dragon is an online slot game from TPG with an oriental theme and 243 ways to win.

faq.question: What are the symbols in Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: The symbols in Golden Dragon include sacred animals like the koi carp and turtle, as well as mythical creatures like the dragon and phoenix.

faq.question: What is the grid size of Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: The grid size of Golden Dragon is 5 reels and 3 rows.

faq.question: How many ways to win does Golden Dragon have?
faq.answer: Golden Dragon has 243 ways to win.

faq.question: What are the special features of Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: Golden Dragon has a Free Spins feature activated by 3 or more Scatter symbols. The gold coins that appear during this feature can reveal high-level winnings. If at least six coins appear during regular gameplay, the player will get 5 Free Spins.

faq.question: Is there a mute button in Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: Yes, there is a button on the screen that allows you to mute the oriental music in Golden Dragon.

faq.question: Can I activate automatic spins in Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: Yes, you can activate automatic spins and the reel rotation accelerator in Golden Dragon.

faq.question: What is the payout of the highest-value symbol in Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: The golden tree symbol in Golden Dragon is one of the highest-value symbols and also serves as the Scatter. The payout will depend on the number of symbols appearing on the reels.

faq.role: You are an experienced writer in the field of online slot games.
faq.prompt:
Below is a review of the game "Golden Dragon".

Please provide an FAQ:

- 8 questions
- Use simple language and provide practical takeaways.
- Respond with a JSON!
- Use the key "faq" and an array with the keys "question" and "answer". 

Review: Golden Dragon
Red and gold are the predominant colors in Golden Dragon, one of the latest slot games from the provider TPG. All symbols are large, some represent sacred animals such as the koi carp and the turtle, others fantastic beasts such as the dragon or the phoenix.
From a graphic point of view, Golden Dragon appears to have good definition, although perhaps more effort could have been made on the style. Venial sin, especially given the fact that the game mechanics are smooth and without annoying slowdowns. There are no animations, but we expected that, knowing how much TPG prefers to focus on the essentials. Not for nothing are the buttons very large, making the gameplay more comfortable. Some keys are arranged on the right side, others on the bottom bar.
The oriental music is very soft, not at all intrusive, but there is a button on the screen that allows you to mute it.
Main features of the slot machine
We can also understand TPG's love of tradition from the choice of the grid size, which has 5 reels and 3 rows. One of the best features of this slot is the large number of ways to win, 243 to be exact. Winning combinations are considered those composed of adjacent identical symbols, starting from the leftmost reel and proceeding towards the right. The winning combos will always be indicated by a golden line.
From the keypad below the grid, you can activate automatic spins and the reel rotation accelerator.
Many golden symbols for super combos!
Playing Golden Dragon is like taking a dive into Chinese culture while sitting in your own armchair. This is possible thanks to the 10 regular symbols and the two special ones.
Let's start with the least valuable symbols, the animals: phoenix, cat, turtle, and koi carp. Following in order of remuneration, we find the colored mandalas and the golden tree, which besides being a paying symbol, also covers the function of the Scatter. Based on the number of symbols appearing on the reels, we can access a variable number of Free Spins. It goes from a minimum of 8 free spins with 3 Scatters to a maximum of 24 with 5 Scatters.
During the free spins, the gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire Bonus Game. Only at the end of the Free Spins, each coin will reveal its value, ensuring us very high-level winnings.
This particular feature is also activated if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay. In this case, the Free Spins will be 5.

faq.answer: Yes, there are two special symbols in Golden Dragon - the golden tree, which is also a Scatter symbol, and the gold coins.

faq.answer: The golden tree symbol acts as a paying symbol and also covers the function of the Scatter symbol. Based on the number of symbols appearing on the reels, we can access a variable number of Free Spins.

faq.question: How many free spins can we get in Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: We can get a minimum of 8 free spins with 3 Scatters to a maximum of 24 with 5 Scatters in Golden Dragon.

faq.question: What happens during the Free Spins in Golden Dragon?
faq.answer: During the free spins, the gold coins that appear on the reels remain fixed for the entire Bonus Game. Only at the end of the Free Spins, each coin will reveal its value, ensuring us very high-level winnings.

faq.question: Can we activate the gold coins feature during regular gameplay?
faq.answer: Yes, if at least six gold coins appear during regular gameplay, the gold coins feature will be activated, and we will get 5 Free Spins.
